name: Beacons
headline: An AI-powered, all-in-one business platform for content creators
description: Helping creators build smarter and more successful businesses with websites, email marketing, ecommerce, and more.

founders.name: Neal Jean, Co-founder, CEO
founders.description: Hey, I'm Neal! Before Beacons, I did my PhD in the Stanford AI Lab where I did research in deep learning.

founders.name: David Zeng, Founder
founders.description: Hi, I'm David. I went to college in Illinois, then did my PhD in signal processing and machine learning for medical imaging at Stanford. My hobbies include lifting and food arbitrage.

founders.name: Jesse Zhang, Founder
founders.description: 👋 Hey, I'm Jesse. I grew up in the Boston area and studied electrical engineering at Tufts University. I came to Stanford right after to do a PhD in machine learning and genomics.

### Beacons: Empowering Creators with an All-in-One Platform

**Overview**
Founded in 2019 and hailing from the heart of San Francisco, Beacons is an innovative startup that quickly gained traction as part of Y Combinator’s Batch S19. With a team of 35 talented professionals, their mission is straightforward yet profound: to provide an AI-powered, all-in-one business platform tailored for content creators.

**What They Do**
Beacons started with the goal of making life easier for creators by providing tools that streamline building and managing their businesses. Whether it’s setting up a website, managing email marketing, selling products through e-commerce, or simply analyzing social media performance, Beacons combines these functionalities into a single user-friendly platform.

Imagine having your own Link-in-Bio that isn’t just a link farm but a full-fledged storefront and marketing hub. Creators can sell products, manage their followers, and generate brand deals—all from this single interface. 

**Features and Applications**
Beacons is continuously rolling out new features to enhance user experience and maximize sales. They offer a suite of applications, including:

- **Website Builder:** Create a professional site without any coding skills.
- **Email Marketing:** Craft and send targeted emails to your audience to boost engagement.
- **E-commerce Store:** Launch an online storefront to sell products effortlessly.
- **Post Activity Tracking:** Analyze your posts’ performance across platforms.
- **Audience Manager:** Know your fans better with tools to manage your community.
- **AI Brand Outreach:** Generate customizable pitches effortlessly using AI.
- **Invoicing & Payment Solutions:** Simplify your billing and get paid quickly.

Beacons even provides utilities like a link shortener and a W-9 generator to cater to the administrative needs of content creators.

**Why It Matters**
In today's digital landscape, creators need more than just a following; they need sustainable income and effective tools to manage their businesses. Beacons simplifies this process, effectively allowing creators to focus on what they do best—creating.

### Conclusion
Beacons is not just a tool; it’s a vital ally in the creator economy that furnishes artists, influencers, and content creators with everything they need to thrive without the hassle of juggling multiple platforms. If you’re a creator looking to streamline your business operations, [check out Beacons](https://beacons.ai). You're in for a game-changer.
